001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.widget.SeekBar;
005import android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener;
006import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
007import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
008import androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBar;
009import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import android.view.LayoutInflater;
012import android.view.View;
013import android.view.ViewGroup;
014import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
015import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
016import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.GameResultsAdapter;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.FragmentScoresBinding;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.CodebreakerViewModel;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.GameResultViewModel;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel;
023
024@AndroidEntryPoint
025public class ScoresFragment extends Fragment implements OnSeekBarChangeListener {
026
027  private FragmentScoresBinding binding;
028  private GameResultViewModel viewModel;
029  private int initialCodeLength;
030
031  @Override
032  public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
033    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
034// TODO: 3/11/2024 Read initial Code Length from settings
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  public View onCreateView(
039      @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
040    // Inflate the layout for this fragment
041    binding = FragmentScoresBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
042    binding.codeLength.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(this);
043    binding.clearScores.setOnClickListener((v)->viewModel.clearResults());
044    return binding.getRoot();
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
049    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
050    ViewModelProvider provider = new ViewModelProvider(this);
051    viewModel = provider.get(GameResultViewModel.class);
052    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
053    LifecycleOwner owner = getViewLifecycleOwner();
054    viewModel
055        .getGameResults()
056        .observe(owner, (gameResults) -> {
057          GameResultsAdapter adapter = new GameResultsAdapter(requireContext(), gameResults);
058          binding.gameResults.setAdapter(adapter);
059        });
060    binding.codeLength.setProgress(binding.codeLength.getMax());
061    binding.codeLength.setProgress(binding.codeLength.getMin());
062//    binding.codeLength.setProgress(initialCodeLength);// for use with original navigation
063    CodebreakerViewModel codebreakerViewModel = provider.get(CodebreakerViewModel.class);
064    codebreakerViewModel
065        .getGame()
066        .observe(owner, (game)-> binding.codeLength.setProgress(game.getLength()));
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public void onDestroyView() {
071    binding = null;
072    super.onDestroyView();
073  }
074
075
076
077  @Override
078  public void onProgressChanged(SeekBar seekBar, int progress, boolean fromUser) {
079    viewModel.setCodeLength(progress);
080    binding.codeLengthValue.setText(String.valueOf(progress));
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public void onStartTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {
085    // Do nothing. No need to handle this
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public void onStopTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {
090    // Do nothing. No need to handle this
091  }
092
093}
